title: The Son
description: SONNY'S ON THE RUNSonny is a model prisoner. He listens to the confessions of other inmates, and absolves them of their sins.HE'S BEEN LIED TO HIS WHOLE LIFEBut then one prisoner's confession changes everything. He knows something about Sonny's disgraced father.SONNY WANTS REVENGEHe needs to break out of prison and make those responsible pay for their crimes.WHATEVER THE COST
author: Jo Nesb√∏
